prompts: Create a sturdy rock-type Pokemon with a strong, square body and bright yellow eyes.
I want to see a Pokemon that resembles a golem, featuring earthy colors and a rugged appearance.
Generate a mystical creature with a humanoid shape, made of stone and adorned with glowing elements.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of ancient ruins, with a weathered look and a formidable stance.
Imagine a powerful golem-like Pokemon that is built for battle, showcasing a blend of blue and brown colors.
Design a Pokemon that has a unique mechanical appearance, with intricate details and a solid form.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like it came from a forgotten era, with a tough exterior and vibrant accents.
